Package org.cougaar.core.blackboard

This package contains the Cougaar publish/subscribe BlackboardService.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ABATranslation A community membership change description for an AttributeBasedAddress, used by Domain ABAChangeLogicProviders.
ActiveSubscriptionObject Marker interface for blackboard objects that react to a BlackboardService BlackboardService.publishAdd(java.lang.Object), BlackboardService.publishChange(java.lang.Object), or BlackboardService.publishRemove(java.lang.Object) calls.
BlackboardClient Required service requestor API for the BlackboardService.
BlackboardForAgent This service is used by agent components to manage the blackboard.
BlackboardServesDomain A Domains view of the blackboard.
ChangeReport A marker interface for describing a change to an object on the blackboard.
Claimable An object "claimed" by a single actor, typically a plugin instance.
ClaimableHolder An indirect holder of a Claimable.
Directive A blackboard object that directly corresponds to an inter-agent Message.
MessageManager A message acknowledgement manager used by the Distributor's non-lazy persistence mode to ensure that unacknowledged messages are persisted.
NewDirective Modifiable interface for a Directive.
OverrideChangeReport A ChangeReport that should override old ones in the same transaction.
PrivilegedClaimant A marker interface for Subscribers that are allowed to modify Claimable blackboard objects even if they are not the owner (typically just the Blackboard).
Publishable An optional marker interface for objects that can be published to the blackboard.
 

Class Summary
AnonymousChangeReport A change report for an anonymous (unspecified) change.
Blackboard A Subscriber created by the StandardBlackboard that maintains a view of all published objects, invokes Domain LogicProviders, and monitors community membership changes.
Blackboard.ObjectTracker  
BlackboardAlert A generic blackboard alert object used to notify agent or plugin about anomalous data on an agent's blackboard.
BlackboardAlertRelay Implementation of a relay class that contains a BlackboardAlert object as its content.
BlackboardClient.Local ThreadLocal for static utilities to find the BlackboardClient context.
BlackboardClientComponent This component is a standard base class for Components that use the BlackboardService.
BlackboardServiceProvider The service provider for the BlackboardService, BlackboardQueryService, and BlackboardMetricsService.
BulkEnvelopeTuple An EnvelopeTuple indicating that a collection of objects have been added to the blackboard.
ChangeEnvelopeTuple An EnvelopeTuple indicating that an object on the blackboard has been modified.
ClaimableImpl Implementation of the Claimable API.
ClaimableImplBeanInfo A BeanInfo property description for ClaimableImpl.
CollectionSubscription<E> A subclass of Subscription that maintains a Collection of blackboard objects matching the filter predicate, plus ChangeReports for the objects changed since the last transaction.
DeltaSubscription A subscription that only tracks add/change/remove deltas.
DirectiveImpl A standard base class for Directives.
DirectiveMessage A Message containing Directives.
DirectiveMessage.DirectiveWithChangeReports A Directive with associated ChangeReports.
Envelope A container for blackboard add/change/remove EnvelopeTuples of a single transaction.
EnvelopeMetrics Contains metrics on transaction open and close timestamps.
EnvelopeMetricsSubscription A Subscription that collects EnvelopeMetrics.
EnvelopeTuple A container for a tranaction's add/change/remove of a single object.
IncrementalSubscription<E> A CollectionSubscription that records add/change/remove deltas.
InitializeSubscriptionEnvelope A special blackboard-internal Envelope used to initialize a Subscription.
PersistenceEnvelope An Envelope sent by persistence to restore a rehydrated blackboard.
PublishableAdapter A useful base class for objects which implement the Publishable interface.
PublisherInfo A data structure returned by PublisherSubscription.
PublisherSubscription A subscription that tracks the plugin publisher and add/change stacks for UniqueObjects.
PublishHistory A record of the recent publication history, enabled by the Distributor's "keepPublishHistory" option, that can be used to help debug apparently anomalous publish events.
PublishStack A stacktrace holder for Blackboard "savePriorPublisher" tracking of blackboard objects and their publishers.
QuerySubscription<E> A lightweight CollectionSubscription used to take a single "query" snapshot of the blackboard.
ReservationManager The ReservationManager coordinates Distributor persistence to ensure that only one agent can persist at a time, and that an agent preparing to persist will not block other agents from persisting.
StandardBlackboard This component advertises the BlackboardService and manages the Blackboard.
Subscriber The standard implementation of the BlackboardService.
Subscription<E> A filtered view of the blackboard that is updated between BlackboardService transactions.
SubscriptionWatcher A callback for BlackboardService.registerInterest(org.cougaar.core.blackboard.SubscriptionWatcher) subscription or alarm activity.
TimestampedEnvelope An envelope that records the subscriber name, time of "openTransaction()", and time of "closeTransaction()".
TimestampEntry The creation time and most recent modification time for a UniqueObject on the blackboard.
TimestampSubscription A Subscription that tracks UniqueObject publishAdd and most recent publishChange timestamps.
TodoSubscription<E> A subscription that queues objects, such as Alarms and other non-blackboard callbacks, for processing in the plugin's "execute()" thread.
Transaction Required transaction support to record a thread's active Subscriber and maintain attached ChangeReports.
UniqueObjectSet A custom Set that maintains a Map-like associations from UIDs to UniqueObjects.
 

Exception Summary
BlackboardException An unchecked exception thrown when there is a problem detected by blackboard interactions.
PublishException An IllegalArgumentException for invalid or failed publish operations.
SubscriberException An exception thrown by a Subscriber.
SubscriptionException An unchecked exception thrown when a problem is detected by subscription mechanisms.
 

Package org.cougaar.core.blackboard Description

This package contains the Cougaar publish/subscribe BlackboardService.

The standard agent contains a StandardBlackboard component that provides the BlackboardService, which is a wrapper around the Subscriber class. The StandardBlackboard creates the Distributor, which manages the subscribers, and the special Blackboard subscriber to maintain a view of all blackboard objects and invoke Domain LogicProviders. Each subscriber has a set of Subscriptions that are known only to that subscriber. A subscriber registers with the distributor to receive blackboard add/change/remove notification "tuples". When a subscriber wishes to modify the blackboard contents, it must start a distributor transaction, fill an envelope with add/change/remove tuples, and finish the distributor transaction. The distributor also coordinates periodic persistence and ensures that blackboard updates are thread-safe.

For more detail, see the Cougaar Developers' Guide.
